function.name: search_adverse_media
function.description: Search Google News for adverse media coverage related to a specific company, person, or entity. This tool searches for negative news articles containing adverse keywords like fraud, lawsuit, investigation, scandal, etc. Returns articles with relevance scores to help assess potential reputational risks.

search_subject.description: The name of the company, person, or entity to search for adverse media coverage. Should be a specific name rather than generic terms.

adverse_keywords.description: List of adverse keywords to search for in relation to the subject. Common examples include: fraud, lawsuit, investigation, scandal, controversy, violation, penalty, fine, corruption, breach, misconduct, allegations, criminal, prosecution, settlement, sanctions, embezzlement, bribery, money laundering, tax evasion, regulatory action, compliance violation.
